total amount spent on amazon

The total amount spent on Amazon is 1621.8. This was calculated by filtering the df2 dataframe where 'Source_File' contains 'Amazon', and then summing the 'TotalAmount' column of the filtered dataframe.

To verify this, you can run the following Python command:

```python
df2[df2['Source_File'].str.contains('Amazon', case=False, na=False)]['TotalAmount'].sum()
```

This will return the total amount spent on Amazon as 1621.8.
